item.description:
Amanda Miller is a life coach and she is developing workshops for her venture. She wants to tap our members for ideas to make her operations and marketing efforts more effective. I hope that many of you will be able to share with her your experiences and provide her with advice on how to proceed with her business model.
As always, any and all information shared by the presenter are considered confidential and that no disclosure outside of the group and the meeting is permitted without express consent from Amanda Miller.
Thank you very much for your participation and interest.
item.name: Help Amanda Miller with her Workshops
